tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE visualizations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  data_source VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE data_sources (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE visualizations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    viz_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    viz_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    data_source_id INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (data_source_id) REFERENCES data_sources(id)
);

CREATE TABLE data_integrity (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    visualization_id INT,
    foreign_key_check BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    data_source_check BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (visualization_id) REFERENCES visualizations(id)
);
